info.name: Qilin.Cloud - Offer API (v1.0.2)
info.description:
This is the openAPI specification for the Offer API of Qilin.Cloud

# Authentication

Qilin offers two forms of authentication:
  - bearer
  - api_key

bearer - an open protocol to allow secure authorization in a simple
and standard method from web, mobile and desktop applications.
